Title: Proof of Matrix Norm (Inverse Matrix)
AcceptedAnswer: Use $\lVert AB\rVert \leq \lVert A\rVert \lVert B\rVert$, as the induced norm is in particular submultiplicative . So that $\lVert I_n\rVert \leq \lVert A\rVert \lVert A^{-1}\rVert$.
